thread.title: Huge fire onboard British Airways flight
thread.title_full: Huge fire onboard British Airways flight

author: eTN Editor
title: Huge fire onboard British Airways flight
text:
Huge fire onboard British Airways flight Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 08, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
Before take-off, a British Airways flight with 159 passengers and 13 crew members onboard caught on fire today at McCarran Airport in Las Vegas, Nevada, US. 
According to initial reports, the left engine caught on fire. 
All passengers were evacuated from the Boeing 777-200 aircraft and two people were taken to the hospital due to minor injuries. 
Flight 2276 was scheduled for London Gatwick. [video courtesy of DAHBOO777 on YouTube] 
One runway had to be shut down, but other runways are operating as usual. 
The cause of the fire is under investigation.
